description.value:
You apply the principles of magitek to your weapon, allowing you to strike distant targets with force.

Your invention gains the reach trait until the end of the current turn. If your invention weapon already had the reach trait, increase the reach of that weapon by an additional 5 feet. Any actions that allow you to Strike with your reach at a given range also benefit from this increased range.

Overcharge Function Your invention's reach increases by an additional 5 feet, and this increase lasts until the end of your next turn. This increased reach only applies to actions taken on your turn, and does not increase your threatened area for the purpose of triggering reactions. As a single action with the manipulate trait, you can Sustain the effect for up to 1 minute.

value.value: your invention is a melee weapon
